name: Below the Known
description: The world is out of human control. The portals where opening and we knew it. These portals, they glowed red, we called them the Externus. Out came the awful creatures of the Externus. They wanted one thing, our souls. The sucked our souls straight from us by mere touching. As the Externus got more powerful, I was sucked in under the immense foreign pressure. I now find myself alone in some type of hell surrounded by the creatures.
